name: @shumoku/server
description: Real-time network topology visualization server with Zabbix integration

scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "cd api && bun run dev" "cd web && bun run dev"
scripts.build: cd api && bun run build && cd ../web && bun run build
scripts.typecheck: cd api && bun run typecheck && cd ../web && bun run check
